single vision.title: Single Vision Lenses
single vision.description: Lenses that have a single prescription for vision correction, suitable for either distance or near vision.
benefits: Simpler and often more affordable than multifocal lenses.

bifocal.title: Bifocal Lenses
bifocal.description: Lenses that have two distinct optical powers, typically for distance and near vision.
benefits: Reduces the need for multiple pairs of glasses.

progressive.title: Progressive Lenses
progressive.description: Lenses that provide a gradual transition between multiple prescriptions for distance, intermediate, and near vision without visible lines.
benefits: Provides seamless vision correction for all distances.
